mapper.insert: insert into exam (exam_id, exam_name, course_id, paper_id, total_score, start_time, end_time, exam_time) VALUES (#{examId},#{examName},#{courseId},#{paperId},#{totalScore},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{examTime})
mapper.select: select * from exam e left join student_paper_record s on e.exam_id=s.exam_id where s.student_id = #{id} and s.student_mark != -1
